intro: Heteropterys rufula, commonly known as the roughleaf woodbine, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of the Americas, particularly in countries like Mexico and Central America. Heteropterys rufula is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and along stream banks.
